name: Shin Ubot
description: Pluggable telegram userbot, made in python using Telethon.

API_ID.description: Dapatkan API ID di web my.telegram.org Masukan yg APP ID Telegram

API_HASH.description: Dapatkan API Hash di web my.telegram.org

SESSION.description: Session String (telethon or pyrogram) for your telegram user account. The userbot will NOT work without a session string!!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Ambil Heroku API KEY mu disini Â» https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Masukan Nama App heroku, Nama App yang paling pertama di isi (liat paling atas)
